column4: can anyone help me get my netgear MA311 wireless card to work? edgy finds it, but doesn't let it connect to my wireless network
i went here https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HardwareSupportComponentsWirelessNetworkCardsNetgear and it says it is supposed to be supported
How do you connect to your wireless network?
what do you mean how? WEP
Are you sure your system is capable of using WEP? I've had trouble in Dapper...
no, i'm not sure. how would i find out? i would like to stay mildly protected considering the computer i am typing on right now is still windows
And try to use wep with iwconfig
hold on, i am brand new. do what now?
If your system encounters a problem trying to use WEP it should show up in the logs
ok, simply type 'man iwconfig' into a gnome-terminal
